humanMachineDialogue.author: user
humanMachineDialogue.text: What's your opinion on pineapple pizza?

humanMachineDialogue.author: assistant
humanMachineDialogue.text: As an AI, I don't have personal opinions.

humanMachineDialogue.author: user
humanMachineDialogue.text: But do people generally like it?

humanMachineDialogue.author: assistant
humanMachineDialogue.text: Some people enjoy it, while others don't.

humanMachineDialogue.author: user
humanMachineDialogue.text: What ingredients go well with pineapple?

humanMachineDialogue.author: assistant
humanMachineDialogue.text: Ham, bacon, or chicken are popular choices.
